price: док ђавољеве поданике ђаволи подржавају у заблуди и никако не престају.
arabic: وَإِخۡوَٰنُهُمۡ يَمُدُّونَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡغَيِّ ثُمَّ لَا يُقۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-ikh'wānuhum yamuddūnahum fī al-ghayi thumma lā yuq'ṣirūna
